item.title: Only donators can buy from shop
item.dc:creator: @adrijusxx adrijusxx
item.description:
@adrijusxx wrote:

i dont know how ;D

if (MyShopID == 44) { if (playerItemsN[Slot] >= TotPrice2) { if (freeSlots() > 0) { deleteItem(995, GetItemSlot(995), TotPrice2); addItem(itemID, 1); server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1; server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) { server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { sM("Not enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { sM("Not enough coins for this item."); } }

donator points sucksâ€¦ it can be more easily to buy for coins items if you are donator more players buy donators ;D and donator is very cheap
